structure.unit: ARTICLE LXX. MEDAL OF MERIT AWARD; SELECTION COMMITTEE

law.catch_line: Medal of Merit created; implementation of program.

text.section:
Sec. 2-961. Medal of Merit created; implementation of program.
There is hereby created a "Medal of Merit" award which the Board of County Commissioners shall annually present to those citizens who have exhibited exemplary dedication to improve the quality of life in Miami-Dade County. The County Manager shall develop for approval by the Board an Administrative Order with appropriate procedures to implement a program for the award for the Medal of Merit.
